name: CLOCKING OUT (CROW'S NEST, CallMyLawyer, NoStereo, TakkoPanda)
name_original: CLOCKING OUT (CROW'S NEST, CallMyLawyer, NoStereo, TakkoPanda)
description:
CLOCKING OUT is an endless bullet hell arena shooter!

This game was made for Bullet Hell Jam 2022!

Features:

  • Non-stop arena-shooting action that gets harder and harder!
  • A scoring system that is both combo-centric and risk-reward!
  • 5 different weapons to mow down 10 types of enemies with!

You are CONFINED to the weapon you are given until its shift is over, until then your goal is to kill as many enemies and collect as much money from them as possible before your weapon gets switched out!

PROTIP: Stop shooting to suck in all the money onscreen!

Controls (US QWERTY layout):

MoveWASDFocus (slow movement)ShiftAim and ShootMouse and Left Click
QuitEsc

Credits (jam team):

  • Programming: rollingcrow [itch.io, Twitter]
  • Art: Pleinair [itch.io]
  • BGM: NoStereo [Carrd, itch.io]
  • SFX: TakkoPanda [itch.io, Twitter]

Credits (third party):

  • Art: Kenney, Sinestesia, spiral atlas
  • Fonts: Font Diner, ndiscovered
